description: Short code identifying a standardized failure/issue reason used when logging vehicle or asset problems.
Human-readable description of the failure reason corresponding to failure_code.
Optional free-text notes providing additional context or instructions related to the failure type.
Likely identifier for the asset management control point, cost center, or location associated with this failure type; confirm with SME.
Yes/No indicator of whether selecting this failure type counts the asset as down (unavailable for service).
User ID or name of who created this failure type entry.
Date and time when this failure type entry was created.
User ID or name of who last modified this failure type entry.
Date and time of the most recent update to this failure type entry.
Numeric grouping code used to categorize related failure types for reporting or workflow; confirm exact meaning with SME.
Flag indicating whether this failure type must be reported to external parties or regulators.
Indicates whether this failure type is currently active and selectable in the system.
